bibl.title: A Fragment of a Table of Consuls from Tebtunis.
Proceedings of the XIV International Congress of Papyrologists
bibl.author: Tait, W.J.

bibl.note: Egypt Exploration Society. Table of the consuls for the years 149-159. Not later than the end of the second century. To be published in a volume of the Society's new documentary series.
bibl.seg: Tait W.J., A Fragment of a Table of Consuls from Tebtunis.
Proceedings of the XIV International Congress of Papyrologists (London, 1975) pp. 299-304.
